abilities.name: Chain Slash
abilities.description: Deals 400 + 100% Physical Damage and 100% Magical Damage to all enemies. Has a 20% chance to stun each target for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Drink Up!
abilities.description: Heals self for 800 HP and increases Healing Power by 20% for 4 turns. Cooldown reduced by 1 when healed.

abilities.name: Headbutt
abilities.description: Deals 65% Physical Damage and stuns the target for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Fire Shield
abilities.description: Grants 25% damage reduction for 5 turns. Attackers take 50% of the damage they deal (before reduction) back as magic damage.

passive.name: Lifesteal on Stun
passive.description: Whenever Infernal Birdie successfully stuns a target, he permanently gains 1% Lifesteal.
